content: Dear all, reposting a CZ specific post (from the general stream): The CIIRC team of Prof. Zdenek Hanzalek is now entering discussion with Czech officials to possibly implement the planning and scheduling algorithm for hospitals to mitigate the risk of insufficient resources (esp. beds with ventilation assistance). If anyone would like to contribute or is interested in this topic, please contact directly prof. Zdenek Hanzalek (Zdenek.Hanzalek@cvut.cz).

another CZ initiative - Coronavirus - call to action, Dusan Senkypl, Pavel Zima and Petr Simecek are already discussing it with A.Babis: please have a look on https://www.meetup.com/keboolacz/events/269374140/

Coronavirus - call to action
Sat, Mar 14, 2020, 10:00 AM: Roky jsme na to trénovali. Máme nejlepší technologie. Máme spoustu praxe. Jsme generace co žije online. Remote work pro nás není problém. Async komunikaci máme pod kůží. R
